title: Choiceof Two Treatments Including Chinese Massage, Reflexology or Acupuncture for £28at Herbwood (Up to £90 Value)
highlights:
• Each treatment lasts 30 minutes
  • Age old techniques
  • Close to Wrexham Central Rail

title: Spa Getaway for Two for One Night (£54) or Two Nights (£99) at Mercure Bolton Last Drop Village Hotel and Spa (Up to 56% Off)
highlights:
• Chocolate and fudge box amenities for one-night stay - Bottle of wine in the room for two-night stay 
  • Breakfast included on both days
  • Full access to spa and leisure facilities, 25% discount on spa treatments 
  • 15% off food in the restaurant
  • Additional night carries 50% discount 
  • Close to local attractions
